name: Neon Matrix Prototype
description:
I tried to make a homage to "Tron" the movie or "Neuromancer" the book.
I made a mistake in the Menu .It's the wrong sky (not the black one like in the game) so the game Menu it's uglier that intended. I will change that after the game Jam.
Move with the arrows or wasd(English Keyboard) or zqsd (french Keyboard). Use the spacebar to fly. You can survive 2 hits.

the menu is useless.

If the game please some people, i can do it better later.

I made all the game since the beginning i didn't used my previous game, i just need more time so it's simplier that i wanted.
